data.message: So everyone is hating on him because they didnt understand his last album? And Eminem would give a fuck about you why? He doesnt know you exist. He doesnt care that you exist. He makes more money shitting than you do in your entire life. Mmlp1 stan = mmlp2 bad guy. I could go on. But what a waste of time it would be on you fucking idiots. He made history. Did you? And I dont give a rats ass if he doesnt know I exist. His music is all I care about. So seriously you imbeciles. Grow up instead of being a hater.

replies.message: Ok, you have a crush on a male rapper, got it. Did he world need to know?

Why yes Aaron. The world did need to know. And since the world was given comments on what they think of him. I guess I did too. Except my comment wasn't hate against him. And a crush? Seriously? I take it you don't respect the bands or artists you listen too. . .
Aaron Fritch is just mad that he'll never amount to anything, so he wants to make other's mad, pathetic.
